channel.title: 3d accelerator
channel.description: i recently purchased a gaming computer(emachines) and it worked fine with graphics, until i formatted to windows xp, now its saying either i dont have a 3d accelerator or that the drivers r old, i cant find any new drivers, and i know i have one, because i was playing runescape(hd), anyone help?

item.title: 3d accelerator
item.dc:creator: @hacks4u hacks4u
item.description:
@hacks4u wrote:

i tried everything, and i found a way that works i had my resolution to high thx mopar, u helped me relize my mistake(in some way i dont know, you reminded me of the resolution)

Read full topic

@moparisthebest wrote:

You say you “can’t find any drivers”, what have you tried?

item.title: 3d accelerator
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

hacks4u:

i recently purchased a gaming computer(emachines) and it worked fine with graphics, until i formatted to windows xp

After formatting you need to reinstall all drivers you had before. (Sound/Graphics, possibly for some mice/keyboards etc).

Read full topic
